title: The richest people in America as of 2019
yAxis: Net worth in billion U.S. dollars
summary: This bar chart has 20 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Net worth in billion U.S. dollars in each Month on the y axis.

The maximum Net worth in billion U.S. dollars 131.0 is found at Month Jeff Bezos & family (Amazon.com) and the minimum is found at Elon Musk (Tesla Motors SpaceX) where Net worth in billion U.S. dollars is 22.3.
The difference of Net worth in billion U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Month is 108.7.
